entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
